attributes.action: take immediate action against late night television quiz programs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I, Karl Jones have just witnessed a ten year old child get through to the studio of the ITV1 late night program "make your play" at 1:14AM on the 19th of February 2007

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
